title: I used to like the app
review:
The new update has done nothing of note but change colours and move stuff around. Why after so many years would you change something. If it ain‚Äôt broke, don‚Äôt fix it is clearly something the developers haven‚Äôt heard before. And why the hell can I still not buy and download kindle books using the app?

Edit: The app was reverted back to the old version a few days after this review but has now changed back again. You get nothing but bad reviews every time you push this ridiculous, user unfriendly update. People like the old version, it‚Äôs easy to Use, everything is easy to find and and it‚Äôs aesthetically pleasing. All things that this new version is not. Pleas stop trying to fix something that isn‚Äôt broke.

title: Why oh why can‚Äôt we sort wishlists by priority at Christmas?!
review:
In many ways I love this app; everything just works‚Ä¶ except that for some bonkers reason you have removed the ability to sort wishlists. All of my family add priorities to wishlists, particularly before Christmas and birthdays. Many items on our lists are simply notes to self, household bits and pieces, etc, which we may or may not return to. Highest and high priority items are those that we‚Äôd genuinely like to receive as gifts. People we invite to the lists have to be able to see these items, and only these, not the miscellaneous other stuff. The removal of our ability to actually view these priorities easily has ruined the whole point of using lists for gift purchases, and caused much frustration. 

Please fix it, so that your features don‚Äôt corral us in ways you want us to go but instead focus on helping us to do what we want, which is ultimately to easily buy the right things from you.

title: Painful to SHARE products. 0 stars if I could.
review:
Cannot share a product!! It‚Äôs so hit and miss. Firstly it‚Äôs almost impossible for anyone to realise where the share button is. Once it‚Äôs found (hovering over the actual product images) it‚Äôs impossible to tap and select! 
It just does not work on countless products. Make it easier! Make it simple. Place the share button at the top right next to the product title/name. Or under the pricing or in the description. Anywhere but on top of the images. You click on the share button and sometimes it opens the image itself. I‚Äôm having to screenshot products to send or just give up and go on the browser/laptop. Absurd UI. Plenty of other reviews have talked about dark patterns too and it‚Äôs obvious. Results shown in-App are different to in browser. This should be a super slick and easy way to search for products. Sharing products to compare with your friends or family should be just straightforward. Why have you made the above difficult?

title: Perfect
review:
As far as apps go and how much you can do, YES this does have some limitations like you cannot seem to copy and paste. But apart from that it‚Äôs having a smaller seller central in your pocket. 
You can easily reply to messages. Check stock and sales. Of course there are some that want the app to even deliver their parcels but let‚Äôs be realistic. When you compare to ebay. Etsy abs others, this by far out performs all the others and is simple to use just like the web based seller central. 

There are always ways to improve of course but as for me it gives everything you need in one place.
I just wish there was an iPad version but to be honest on an iPad you can use the web version with no problems.

title: Not gonna lie!
review: It‚Äôs great but at the same time problematic out for delivery. from you 8pm other delivery place doing the delivery is 10 to 11 am as there using 24hours. As a late night person it is very hard to be up at that time if I‚Äôm up at 6 or 7pm till 7 or 8am. The main issue is the time it‚Äôs been delivered and not showing up when it‚Äôs due to come. The only way I can see a fix for this is a best time for delivery for you system so that it‚Äôs easier for external delivery places have an idea what time is best. This is why I‚Äôm giving you a 4star I think there is a way to improve but besides that everything else is great the layout is spot on... tho where‚Äôs the new Consuls at? Always out of stock same with Xbox series x and possibly ps5. mini rant over been bugging me a bit.

title: Downloading
review:
Why do I have to keep downloading my play lists ...I use this app and my playlists for travelling ..so when I want to play a playlist .....it‚Äôs gone ! Then I have limited music to listen to in a long flight ...annoying 

Premium delivery ? A joke seldom a next day delivery and prime is just getting worse and worse ... I checked yesterday with customer services to check a prime delivery ( next day ) they told me it‚Äôs next day delivery ... ‚Äú when  it‚Äôs dispatched ‚Äú so you buy based on next  day delivery and actually you get it only when it‚Äôs sent ... so why pay prime costs ? Useless and misleading

title: Prime is slacking.
review:
Prime used to be definitely next day delivery and that was fantastic, I am paying for this service after all. But now, I order something on prime with it said to arrive the next day, (order at decent time of course) , but once processing the payments or after paying for the products, now they say the products will be delivered day after next or even more than that. 

When it‚Äôs busy seasons like Christmas, that‚Äôs understandable. Any other time, not acceptable. Products on prime are more expensive after all. I might as well buy a product not on prime and get same delivery dates and lower product price. 

Thank you prime for when you do as you promise!

title: Ordering via the app
review:
Would love to see a tick box next to the items on the order page so the account holder can tick those boxes for the items which have a varied delivery period and have been delivered. 
Sometimes I lose track of where I bought an item from when it gets delivered a few days or wks later if ordering from overseas. 
Currently there‚Äôs no where to do this apart from printing off the order history and manually crossing off on paper what‚Äôs been delivered or not. Having that function within the app would be fabulous for all account holders.

title: Easier to use the website in a browser
review: When I search for specific items on the desktop site I can almost always find what I‚Äôm looking for but when I try to do so on the app I have found far fewer items available for viewing - sometimes only two or three out of hundreds that can be found in the website. I am giving two stars because the app is functional, just not very user friendly. The way the tabs work is needlessly annoying in that tabs pile up and there is no way to go back other than backtrack no through them all which can be tedious or skipping right back to the home page and losing all the tabs. In the end it‚Äôs easier to just use the website in chrome or safari than use this mess of an app.

title: Really nice app but....
review: When looking for clothing you can‚Äôt look for the fabric it‚Äôs made from. It‚Äôs impossible to reply to a message that sent to you and you have to do that on a web browser and not using the app as I found it impossible and how to do that. When an item is dispatched you can‚Äôt be specific in where you want it left due to multiple choice answers only. You also can‚Äôt tell if you are going to get the parcel quickly or not as you don‚Äôt know where the seller is based. There are other issues with this app but apart from a few minor ones, it‚Äôs a really great site to buy from as it‚Äôs a lot cheaper than eBay...

title: Ups and downs.
review: On the one hand, it‚Äôs better to have the controls at the bottom because I can use the thumb that‚Äôs holding the phone to tap things - that is an improvement.  But I don‚Äôt like the way the controls banner floats over the top of content; new stuff (where I‚Äôm looking as I scroll down) gets obscured as soon as it first appears.  If this is a ‚Äúdark pattern‚Äù to keep me scrolling then please know that it‚Äôs just annoying and will probably result in me using the app less, which I‚Äôm sure is not what you‚Äôre aiming for.  Better to have a fixed banner the whole width of the screen.  Also, for goodness sake, get rid of the next button and just have endless scrolling like it used to be.

title: Unable to actually PURCHASE anything....
review:
Whenever I try to tap to ‚ÄòProceed to Checkout‚Äô, it asks me to enter my password. When I enter it, that screen then disappears and I get a message saying ‚ÄúOops, something went wrong‚Äù and throws me back to my basket, BUT when I then tap ‚ÄòProceed to Checkout‚Äô again, it brings me to the Order Confirmation page and when I tap ‚ÄòConfirm‚Äô it sends me back to my basket and I have to tap ‚ÄòProceed to Checkout‚Äô again and the same process starts all over again. In the end I have to go to the actual website and purchase from there. 

Kind of defeats the object of having an app...

title: Great app but could be even better
review:
I really like the app, it‚Äôs easy to use and to find products. Especially in this troubled period. 
I enjoy the fact that you can track your deliveries up to your doorstep. 
One suggestion that can make it even better is when the deliveries are done by a third party it would also be nice to mark them as delivered ourselves. As I‚Äôve still got numerous orders still showing as late for deliveries or expected to be delivered when they‚Äôve already arrived. 
Thanks in advance for your feedback and keep up the good work

title: Glitches
review: This app which I use a lot has became very glitchy. I‚Äôve never known issues like it. When viewing an item and also when viewing a description of an item the top menu functions become unresponsive on a frequent basis. Almost all the time for me. The back button doesn‚Äôt work and the burger with drop down menu doesn‚Äôt work. Search doesn‚Äôt work. The home button doesn‚Äôt work. The only way around is to click on an item in the wishlist which sits at the bottom of the app. The same thing happens over again with the next product. Disappointed to say the very least. Please fix this.

title: Does what it‚Äôs supposed to. But could be better.
review:
Reviewed: 8 Aug 2020 on iPhone XS Max

Likes: 
- it just works, simple to operate and simple to actually buy things (and monitor the progress of deliveries), 
- on the user interface there‚Äôs now a menu that hovers at the bottom so one can reach: ‚Äòhome‚Äô, Your Account, Basket and Menu options within reach of ones thumb if using single-handed...

Dislikes: 
- however, the Search bar is still right at the top unfortunately, 
- still no dark mode, 
- there seems to links all over the place, maybe there‚Äôs a way to have a hovering menu that provides easier access to: customer reviews, similar items, product details, etc, 
- would be nice to have an option for a ‚Äòdark mode‚Äô icon, 
- does not swivel around to work in landscape orientation, 
- no widget to see at a glance progress of deliveries, or items in basket, or items in wish list  (for example), 
- no option to lock the app with Touch ID or Face ID (e.g. for those times when the iPhone is being used by the youngest kids). 

Thanks

title: Change for the worse
review: Love the app but for some reason if you put an upcoming deal on your watch list is no longer shows a list of what you‚Äôre watching and in the notifications, where it says a deal has started, if you click on it it just takes you to the deals home page, not directly to the deal you were watching for so there seems no point in a watch list any longer. No idea why it was changed but please change back as I don‚Äôt have the time to scroll through all deals every time I to find one item that I may not want anyway, you are loosing sales by this. Would be five stars if this was corrected.

title: Checkout loop!
review: What has happened to this app! 15 various items were in my basket. I go to checkout and are told that some items qualify for free delivery. Great. I continue to checkout and see that my items are automatically sorted into 5 dispatches. I continue to checkout and get sent back to the same page telling me I have free delivery items. This goes on and on and on over and over again and then I get kicked out and have to sign in again. Your twitter page can't help and you email people want a screenshot. Just fix the app!

title: Used to be good.
review:
I used your app when I first got my iPhone a couple of years ago. Mainly because your mobile web page didn't work. 
Then the mobile site started working again earlier this year so stopped using the app. Then recently the mobile site was intermittent sometimes it would work sometimes not so got the app again. 
But ive noticed that searching on the app is worse than the site or mobile site. 
When I searched for something on the app it doesn't allways show everything thats Available. So I won't be using the app ever again as its so intermittent on how it works a bit like your mobile site but at least the mobile site while it works shows me everything on the site.

title: What the hell happened to the app
review:
It WAS convenient and easy to use, now it‚Äôs slow, clunky and hidden behind layers of stupid, unnecessary pages for each filter - why would you ever even begin to think this was a good idea to change it?? Please change it back

And good god the page loading?? Only like 10 items a page then I have to click next?? What happened to the endless scrolling which was far more convenient

Update: it has been weeks of utterly useless update notes that say nothing at all about what has been updated and they seemingly refuse to update this terrible change - either too stubborn to accept that it is literally worse in every way or just creating work for themselves by intentionally making the app bad to use

title: Why update and ruin a perfectly good app
review: Loved this app but now, not so much. Easy enough to search but why oh why would you change how you look at the images when you choose an item. I loved that I could look at the item images in a different window expand if needed. Now I have to run my finger over the images to get a closer look. Nope I definitely don‚Äôt like that please change it back. Also why did you change the function of touching the ratings and being taken to the reviews again please change it back. Other than that it‚Äôs okay!

title: Feedback
review:
I‚Äôve sent feedback via customer service about issues with the iOS app, but don‚Äôt think these points are being sent to Developers. When purchasing an item, it‚Äôs not possible to visit a Seller‚Äôs Store to see if they have other similar items. Also, when filtering search results by price ‚Äòlow to high‚Äô for example, thousands of items disappear from search results. ?? 
I‚Äôd like to see ‚Äòslide left‚Äô actions to manage recommended products, items inspired by shopping trends  and items viewed etc.

title: App Immediately Closes
review: When this app is working which is about 99% of the time it‚Äôs awesome, but on a rare occasion like now I‚Äôve not been able to use it for a few days now.   When I try to open the app it immediately closes, I‚Äôve tried many things to rectify the problem, I‚Äôve done all the necessary things like making sure my iPad‚Äôs firmware is up to date, turning my iPad off and back on again.   I still give it 5 stars though, like I said when it works it‚Äôs awesome!

title: Latest update made it slow
review: It was ok until the latest update. Now things like searches or cart content don't load on my iPhone 8 plus and I just get a white screen in the middle with ‚Äústill loading‚Äù which never seems to happen. Another problem seems to be around the cart and instructions to save things, it just refuses to carry it out and I have to quit and reload the app. Typical case of why fix it when it ain‚Äôt broke?

title: Make complaining easier
review:
Why do you make it so difficult to make a complaint‚Ä¶ the ¬£60 order that I made last week was delivered sometime yesterday evening/night, but nobody bothered knocking on the door, and I went to bed just before 11:00. When I opened the front door this morning just before 6:30, there it was on the front doorstep.

I looked at the tracking information, and it said that the parcel was delivered at 5:18pm, and was handed to the resident, which is just a huge lie‚Ä¶ there was nothing on the froont doorstep when I came home just before six, and it certainly was not handed to anyone. Anyone could have nicked it after it was just left that at who knows what time, why do your delivery drivers tell such lies?

title: All the money in the world and such a poor app
review:
Using the app is so frustrating. It‚Äôs literally impossible to browse through product groups and know the price until you‚Äôve gone through 3 or 4 steps. If I‚Äôm searching for a product I just want to know the price, not a bloody range of prices for 20 different products. Just tell me the price of the item I‚Äôm looking at. And stop advertising something as under a certain price to fit it into the Sale categories, then put it as a group where literally one thing meets the criteria. 

If you select a category that‚Äôs says under ¬£20, logic would dictate that I don‚Äôt want to view items that cost more than that but the way you group products is awful and such a poor experience.

title: Deliveries
review:
I am a prime customer and have been for many years. It‚Äôs very rare that I‚Äôve been unhappy with my service. 
I‚Äôm now unfortunately becoming increasingly upset with medium size packages being forced through my letterbox to the point it‚Äôs now broken and needs to be replaced at a cost to me. Only two days ago I was home.. no knock at the door but aware of my front door rattling, I opened the door and confronted the delivery man about my broken letter box and needless to say he clearly couldn‚Äôt care less that I now have replace it at a cost to me. This is unnecessary, aggressive and a total disregard to the customer, unfortunately me! 
Thanks for costing me extra payment for a replacement especially in this current climate.
Disgruntled Gabrielle Ali

title: Good app missing a few things
review: Good app works well and I use it regularly. Other people have mentioned several missing features. Personally I think a feature where you can split your orders where you can state when you have received the items and it moves it to another list, so you know what‚Äôs still to arrive, useful especially when buying from third party sellers as usually those items can take a while to arrive and if you order things regularly those orders can quickly go down the list.

title: Issue with app
review:
Giving one star to see if I can instigate a conversation with the development team. 

I have noticed that going to customer service contact us section in the app brings up a chat. The issue is that the bottom of the screen is cut off so you cannot respond to it. Seems to be a flaw in how the app perceives the screen size. Checked App Store and tried the support option, but this is only a how to section, with no option to give feedback.

title: Unable to mark orders as delivered etc
review: I use the app regularly and for most purposes it works well. But in the last 2 months i have received over 40 orders. However, of these, 18 are still showing as either dispatched, on its way, expected, running late etc etc. Its becoming increasingly difficult to keep track of which orders are still expected and which have been received or refunded as being lost in transit. Surely its about time functionality was improved to allow users to mark orders as delivered or any other tag. Deleting orders function would also be usefully.

title: Tracking service is good but delivery service is crap
review: Tracking is good as to what time the item is expected. The bad thing about this is lately, goods are just being dumped at the front of the door. I can understand contactless delivery during these times but will your delivery service stop presuming that there will always be someone at the house. Mine was nearly stolen. This has happened a lot in USA and this is happening here as well. This is either sheer laziness or uncaring service just so it is delivered. Will you please include other options as to where the item can be delivered to secure that the good will be delivered safely?

title: Searching
review:
Too many non relevant items appear in search. 
Eg a search for 100% cotton duvet sets will bring  100% polyester in the products offered. Too many misleading descriptions for poor quality products unfortunately, is there no quality control employed over vendors? I‚Äôve seen wall art that has a picture that is clearly over 2.4m wide in the ad, yet max width available is 1.2m. A lot of vendors advertising is designed catch you out and you will unless you look closely at the ad. and reviews. I‚Äôm available if Jeffrey Preston Bezos wants a chat and some randomness. 
Thing is I still use it as it‚Äôs so convenient for a lot of items and will continue to do so.

title: Fast value, excellent customer service
review:
I have been a Prime customer for ages. The postage savings have really mounted up and during lockdown in a remote area the range of goods and the efficiency of delivery have been invaluable.
I also now take advantage of many subscribe and save items which makes value even better. 
The crowning glory is the customer service. If there is a problem or a disagreement it is resolved quickly and almost always in the customer‚Äôs favour.

title: Missing features
review: Decent app but missing a few things that have already been mentioned by other reviewers. Another feature I would personally add that hasn‚Äôt been mentioned is the ability to lock an orders details to a specific device. Everyone in my household uses the same prime account but this means we all have the same account logged on in all our devices, which means we can all see the order history which means that ordering Birthday/Xmas presents is a lot less private than I would like it to be. Fix this and it is 5 stars from me.

title: Why waste space with international reviews?
review: In general I am very happy with the app, but why on earth is so much space wasted by showing international reviews that I can‚Äôt read without translating them? There are generally loads of UK reviews that are not shown because the international ones are. A total pointless waste of screen space. It would be just about acceptable if there were the ability to switch this off but there doesn‚Äôt even seem to be a setting for this. A mistaken experiment in my view!

title: Oh what have they done to this app?
review: Since the last update this app has become an absolute pain to use - the search function seems to have gone backwards to the old hit n miss times - it now brings up many items that do not meet the criteria and misses many items that do. The ability of the search function to accurately handle a multiple word search string has been severely eroded and the final straw is over 1/3 of each search result page is filled with sponsored items many of which, do not even correctly match the search string! It‚Äôs incredibly frustrating! So, after many several years using the app, I‚Äôve gone back to the desktop version. GET THIS FIXED GUYS!

title: Quite good
review:
I‚Äôve been using this app for a while now and I have found it to be very useful. It is very easy to search through and buy items. 
When you‚Äôve bought an item, it gives you notifications of when it will arrive and when it has been delivered. It also gives updates on items you‚Äôve put in your list, if there‚Äôs been any changes. 
Overall quite good and easy to use

title: The devil makes work for idle hands
review:
The app developers must have had time on their hands and no idea what update they should do next so all they could come up with was to make the app look like the web browser. The whole idea of an app surely is to provide a different experience from a web browser not repeat it. The previous version allowed for decent images that I could swipe through in order to make a quick decision as to whether to purchase the item. Now my searching and viewing takes much longer I am feeling like why should I bother.
This change cannot be good for all the sellers who rely on a good reliable quick and easy platform to sell their goods on.

title: Honest British Reviewer
review: We will probably all know Amazon‚Äôs abilities for global domination by now and it‚Äôs only set to get greater as they actually deliver what they say they will. I‚Äôve had the odd issue but that‚Äôs not even 1% of the time and it‚Äôs always 100% down to third party sellers but that being said they all have to honour amazons refunds policy so it‚Äôs no bother at all really. There‚Äôs actually no limit to this company and if they keep up their ways they‚Äôll simply keep going too. Great work.

title: New app not great.
review: Some aspects of the new app are ok. I don‚Äôt like how it seems less stable then the previous style. Since the update when I move to the lightning deal at least half of the time it changes to a blank page. This is annoying. On the upside I‚Äôve spent less moment as I get annoyed and move off the app. I like banner at the bottom but hate that it obscure the content. Also hate the next button. When looking for items I get bored having to press the next button then wait for it too load. So once again annoying and I look elsewhere.

title: No Landscape View
review:
The latest update seems to have eliminated landscape mode. I‚Äôve tried restarting / resetting / deleting and installing but no landscape mode. This I find annoying.

This app always worked for me, a few niggles like kindle book purchases and some account aspects but on the whole solid app, I just do not like it being dictated as to how I actually use the app. I get enough of that when I walk into a shop, please not online now too.

title: Great app
review:
Whilst I love this app as so easy and quick to use, I was wondering if at all there could be something put in place to acknowledge when we have received any item . I‚Äôve bought so much stuff and in ‚Äòmy orders‚Äô there are items I‚Äôve already received but it says ‚Äòexpected on xx‚Äô . 
In my opinion it would be beneficial to have a tab you can press to say already received ? I think this may help the seller too ? 
Just a thought ü§îü§î

title: Double login doesn‚Äôt work!
review: Whilst I understand the need to improve security I fail to see how an inability to login at all will help your business. I cannot login via the app but can via the website since the application was updated, its frustrating to say the least. The process of OTP and character entries and confirmation of my card details is clunky at best. Something you know, something you have and something are works best.

title: Unusable on large iPad
review: Since the last major update of the UI this app is awful to use on the large screen of the 13.9‚Äù iPad. I don‚Äôt particularly like or understand why they‚Äôve limited the amount of items on one page as it‚Äôs annoying even on the phone app, but the endless scrolling is just awful on the iPad. It‚Äôs not how people naturally shop - I‚Äôd prefer to be presented with lots of options so I can then zoom in on the ones that catch my eye, as you would in real life. As it is, every time I search for something on the iPad I just want to shut down the app as soon as the results page appears.

title: What happened...?!
review:
The latest update is a major break from the past. Everything has moved. I‚Äôll get used to it in time but for now it‚Äôs pretty jarring.

What I don‚Äôt understand is why this decision was taken. It‚Äôs extremely bold design, which would be ok if it was enjoyable. But I don‚Äôt like the colours, I don‚Äôt like the 20 different font sizes and I don‚Äôt like the everpresent menu. And I‚Äôm stuck with these unless I use a browser.

Thanks?

title: I really enjoy this app
review: I like this app. It‚Äôs good and easy to manage with your orders. Easy to contact customer service from the app. It helps you to track your order, get notifications and easy to return the items. It‚Äôs easy to pay once you have setup one click payment. Can see your past orders. It‚Äôs really helpful. I really like this app and really enjoy to do shopping from this app.

title: BETTER AND WORSE
review:
Some UX improvements like the bottom navigation, but some awful omissions.
After clicking a product photo, previously user could return to main product screen with a swipe right, now have to reach the top of the screen for the cancel button and slows down the user experience.
Search and filters don't work well, relevancy is not weighted. For example, items that do not match all the search keywords appear in the results, can be seen when ordering by ascending price, search synthetic oil 5w40 5l and 1l (litre) products show up.

title: Why make a good App worse?
review:
This App used to be incredibly user-friendly and productive; but recent updates have removed all the good features and left annoyances.

For example, you can no longer set multiple filter items and then apply them all at one - instead someone obviously thought it was far better to select each filter individually then return you to the search listing.  If you have an idea of what you want and need to set multiple filters, this is now a long tedious operation.

Next, the search results are now split into separate pages which means trying to scroll through multiple items is a drawn out process.  What was wrong with 100 items on each page?

Then there is the Save & Compare feature that was useful for dragging thumbnail pictures from the listing into the Save & Compare list.  This no longer works.

In summary, this used to be a pleasure to use but now it‚Äôs been made worse.

title: Don‚Äôt use their delivery services
review: Fraudster delivery. Marked as delivered, asked delivery guy to leave it a bin near house, when got home checked there is nothing. Writing to support about this issue, spent in total about 5 hrs on the phone with them, nothing happens, still receiving answer in kind of ‚ÄúHey it was delivered to you or your housemates check anybody else who might have it‚Äù, asked for a proof of completing my instructions and basically then it would be my fault that it was stolen, but no, they don‚Äôt have a photo and continue stating that it was delivered to someone in hands, because you told driver your OTP we can‚Äôt issue a refunded replacement. Ridiculous situation, hope this driver enjoys my AirPodsüëçüèΩ

title: Orders
review:
I too have many orders and some say still to be dispatched . As I order sometimes for family I to am finding it difficult to remember what I have or have not received . This can be frustrating as I queried one last week to be told  it had been received? I cannot remember receiving and as in one incident last week received a text to say an order was being delivered on a day ... when I went out in evening to lock up the parcel had been left on top of the parcel box which was empty . 
It could have been nicked  how would I have proved that ...

title: Was near useless on iPad Pro, now fixed.
review:
The App keeps switching from one layout to another, it‚Äôs like a completely new app but it‚Äôs not updating to do this? It‚Äôs now got black banners like the website with no choices along the bottom or on the top right side. I keep deleting it and reinstalling to get the preferred app layout.
I have used this app a lot in the past. Now I use it a lot less when it insisted on spending ¬£20 to get free delivery, ridiculous. This company is massive so charging postage for items under a certain price is greedy. Especially when the likes of HMV & also Very in think do free delivery on ¬£10 and over.

title: Good and bad
review:
The app is useful as it‚Äôs easy to use and is much quicker than using a browser. You can quickly buy an item, no issues. 
The issue comes when you want to contact a seller, as I had an issue and needed to contact the seller about my order. I messaged them and it was pretty straightforward. The problem was that it didn‚Äôt send me any notifications to any of the replies, the replies were not even in the same area. Instead I had to dig through menus to find any reply which was very frustrating as it wasted a lot of time.

title: No way of reporting issues with App?!
review:
I have found an issue with the search function & have searched searched searched for how I report and error. I finally thought I‚Äôd found something useful but all it says is ‚Äúuse your email‚Äù but doesn‚Äôt give an email address. Helpful! Not! Surely reporting app errors is an important part of a seamless online shopping experience. 
So I‚Äôll report my issue here. I put in ‚Äúminecraft‚Äù in the search bar. Filtered on Prime. Then sorted by ‚ÄúAve Customer Rating‚Äù. It brought back all sorts of irrelevant items. The first on the list was Harry Potter! ‚ÄúMinecraft‚Äù is one word, so how on earth can it be relating minecraft with Harry Potter??!! Someone needs to work on the algorithm

title: Give us what we want
review:
Why when I put in the name of an actor, you give me a load of crap I don‚Äôt want. I asked for a specific actor, believe it or not, that is actually what I want.
Why are your movies so expensive to rent? You are not blockbuster. We pay for prime yet you want to rip us off more. It seems you put the films on we have already seen yet want us to pay for the others. 
Your new movies are older than gods dog. Why can‚Äôt you stop ripping us off and treat us as valued customers?
Times are getting harder now we are in lockdown and all you wish to do is profit from peoples misery. You should hang your heads in shame.

title: A bug with voice search.
review: I use voiceover. When making a voice search, i am able to double tap on the what are you looking for text box and voice search with no problems. Having said that, when i search, then tap on back, then tap on voice search, the audio completely turns off. I am able to turn voiceover back on using siri, but this is still a bug.

title: Convenient
review: I use this app all the time and it‚Äôs really convenient. The only problem is, when you order from the app, any dispatch and delivered emails won‚Äôt show the details of the items in the email so it can leave you feeling baffled as to what you ordered if you order a lot like me. Whereas if you use the desktop site, you get email updates pertaining to what you ordered and it‚Äôs details.

title: Some misleading information
review: This is generally a very good app and I use it all the time to buy things worth one click. However I have found that the order tracking can be quite misleading at times. For example right now on my account if I select ‚Äòmy orders‚Äô in the list it shows I have an order ‚ÄòArriving today‚Äô. However when I click that order and navigate to the next screen it says ‚ÄòArriving tomorrow by 9pm‚Äô. This leads to some disappointment.

title: Unable to delete history ...
review:
One of many annoyances of this app - I am unable to delete the history of "Your Recently Viewed Items" - no response at all when tapping "Delete History" under "Manage History". Even trying to remove individual items is very sluggish and only works on very few of the items tapped.

This is the just one of the many problems with this app that is constantly under development. Too many bugs creep in which do not get fixed and then we are left with an app that does only half of the things we expect it to.

title: Utterly Rubbish Update
review:
In all my years as a test manager, I‚Äôve never seen a company update an application and make it far less easy to use quite like this one. This new version has failing filter systems, which disable your ability to get up a layer of the organisational tree. It doesn‚Äôt doesn‚Äôt contain the same sub folders as the live website. I searched for minutes looking for where one category was. I then gave up and looked on the website.

Honestly, the designer and head tester for this update project need to be put on administrative leave. I would personally have suspended them for allowing this trash to market.

title: Signed in/not signed in
review: Since the last couple of updates i can‚Äôt place an order or look up my previous orders, keeps asking for finger print and then telling me something went wrong when i scan my finger print then redirects me to sign in while i‚Äôm already signed in, what is going on, guess i can head down town and get what i need or may be use other web sites. So tried turning off biometric authentication and now i get a dialog box welcoming me by name and asking for my password what the hell is going on with this app. I‚Äôve never had problems with amazon‚Äôs app till now.

title: Worst app for PRIVACY!
review: Dear sir or madam,                                                                Perverts are using coat hanger cameras to spy on ladies in restrooms or hotels when there on the toilet or washing there hands. They take shots and record personal conversations would you like people being nervous because of your product?   I can‚Äôt believe you have not noticed you should fix it immediately!                                                                                       Other spy cameras sold are just as bad with privacy.                      I hope you make the right choice.                                                       Yours faithfully,                                                                                   Mia.

title: Current version is not displaying properly the bottom info on iPhone 8 Plus
review:
I am writing this review in order to report a bug with the current version of the app and iPhone 8 Plus screen size.  
It looks that the app thinks that the iPhone 8 Plus has longer screen (like iPhone XR) as part of information is not displayed at full at the bottom of the screen. 
Otherwise the app works great.

title: Absolutely useless!
review: Search filters are horrible, barely existing any search filters options at all. 3/4 of the screen is filled by adverts of products which I‚Äôm not interested in, and list of products I search for is annoyingly short and doesn‚Äôt allow me to change to more products view on the same page. 90% of products sold are Chinese rubbish, and no option to filter only for UK based sellers. Navigation within the app is a nightmare; takes ages to find what I‚Äôm looking for in the endless maze of adverts of Chinese crap. Customer service non existing and replaced by the automated bot. AVOID. EBay is million times better.

title: The best shopping app
review: Theres not a single day that I don‚Äôt use this app. Though it is really bad for your wallet and amazing for the sellers but I love the fact i can buy anything with confidence that my money isn‚Äôt going in waste. However, i wish it could have the option to see how much money spent per month per card saved in the account. Wouldn't have to rely on other apps in doing so.

title: Cannot see customer reviews anymore?
review:
Unable to see customer reviews on iPad App and things I look at seem to appear on hubbys   iPhone? 
I have Prime and have household too so accounts are linked, but my searching shouldn‚Äôt be showing on hubbys account on his  iPhone account surely ?
Tried deleting App and reinstalling but bugs/ glitches are  still there.
Annoying to say the least!

title: Maps for delivery no longer showing
review: For the last week now I have been getting the usual 8 stops away update message for any parcels but the map to track this has vanished! This is the most useful feature of the delivery especially when your are in a location not easy to find and you can keep a look out for a lost driver once he is showing as near to you on the map. Sometime 8 stops could be 15 mins and sometimes up to an hour so always useful to know. Why has it vanished since last week on phone and iPad apps?

title: No sound with notifications
review:
I have had this app for my iPhone for a long time. Originally it played sound with notifications then stopped. I have followed all recommendations to reinstate the sound but with no success.
Developers, please remedy this problem as it is annoying and can lead to missed deliveries etc.
It is not a recent problem and should have been solved by now.

title: Purchase page on a loop
review:
You would think that with the main aim of this app making buying things from your phone easy, that this would be at least possible. I‚Äôve tried to use this app on several occasions, on different networks/WiFi connections, to no avail. I‚Äôve been unable to complete the checkout page, as anytime I try to change the delivery options the app seems unable to handle it and gets stuck on a loading page. 

I assume this app would work if you didn‚Äôt need to change your delivery options (were happy with your saved default address/default delivery time).

title: Frustrating.
review:
Having to input credit or debit card details when you change an address is understandable but mildly frustrating as I travel a lot. 
The address defaulting back to your home address having already changed the address on an order because you decided to ‚Äúcontinue shopping‚Äù is very frustrating and has caused me to have to cancel orders, ultimately my own fault though. 
Gift messages you‚Äôve typed out then being forgotten because you decided to ‚Äúcontinue shopping‚Äù is irritating to the point that I cancelled the order.

title: What‚Äôs gone wrong???
review:
This used to be one of my favourite apps. Then suddenly I couldn‚Äôt checkout any more! I couldn‚Äôt sign in either to view previous orders. So I could add items to my basket then had to end up using IE or Safari to checkout.
Today I‚Äôve uninstalled the app and re-installed the app.
I can now checkout - yippee!!...but...l.can no longer access my wish list or any of my saved friends and families wish lists. Tells me I need to update the app. Well, as I‚Äôd just updated to the latest app half an hour (apparently released 4 days ago?!?!), I have the latest app.
It‚Äôs now a pointless app - as a Prime customer I use it lots. Very disappointing

title: Great app, easy to use. Filters could be better
review: Use this app a lot but they changed the filter screen a while ago and I find it far less intuitive than before plus often still brings up other items even when you have searched for something specific. I wanted a metal version of a measuring tool for example but even though metal was in the title it still threw up a load of plastic ones

title: Customer question search not working
review:
Would be nice if customer questions could finally be fixed? Searching for key words brings up nothing - even though I can see the searched key word in the first question. Now, to make matters worse, clicking to see more customer questions doesn‚Äôt allow you to see them all, just a few more. This has been going on for a few versions. Maybe FIX this finally can you? 
(Using iPad mini 5)

title: Global retail upheaval probably needs a neat little app., and this does the job nicely.
review:
I suppose I could moan that the Lists go a little squirly once in a while, some of the reviews are clearly bought and paid for and prices can be kinda high once in a while. 

But that would just be petty really.  And rather misses the point.  This glorious global retail juggernaut has an app it does the job very well.   Go shop.

title: What have you done?
review: What an awful update! The home screen is about as interesting as lifting a toilet lid. J used to enjoy flicking through the ‚Äòsimilar ‚Äò pages, and the ‚Äòwhat you might like‚Äô stuff. Now it‚Äôs dull and bland. What you‚Äôve successfully done here is stop people buying things on a whim, and if that was your aim, well done. If you wanted people to browse your wares and pick things as you would in a supermarket, then sack whoever designed this tosh and go back to what you had. This is a classic case of ‚Äòif it ain‚Äôt broke, don‚Äôt fix it‚Äô. It was not broke - it is now!

title: What is the point?
review: The search function is useless. I thought the on website/desk top was bad but this app takes the biscuit. It in all probability is the same engine it just seems worse on the app. Aside from you cannot manage your account, it‚Äôs very basic function yet you cannot do it here, head off to your nearest available to to PC otherwise your not going to get it done. The only thing that is good about this app is the up to the minute notifications of your delivery‚Äôs progress from your local delivery depot it is that and that alone that gave two stars. Otherwise it would have been zero

title: Fairly decent app
review:
I find the all good and easy to use. I like being able to track the delivery when they are within 8 deliveries away and being able to put delivery options such as leave with a neighbour.
I am a bit disappointed the iOS widget has been removed in a recent update. I used to use this as a quick link for my order updates. I would appreciate it if this could be brought back.

title: Okay for normal items, terrible for kindle
review: I use this app to purchase random items when I think of them on the go, and it works fine for what I need. But if I want to buy a kindle format book to read on the move, it will ONLY let me download a sample, it will never let me buy the whole book. Despite being able to buy the same title in paperback, and despite being able to buy the same title for kindle on the website in my phone's browser. This is intensely annoying.

title: Prime
review: Accidentally signed up to prime without knowing as I must have clicked the more prominent button activating the prime without giving it a double take managed to cancel it after ¬£40 was spent on it and then cancelling I‚Äôve hit subscribe annually which has taken another ¬£79 out my account which I think is getting put back in. But it‚Äôs really annoying when there aren‚Äôt any messages saying are you sure you want prime or to upgrade to annual it just sets it right away with one accidental click and charges instantly. Hoping I get the ¬£79 back though.... please add warnings after tapping the subscription buttons.

title: Redesign is a backward step
review:
The redesign and new colour scheme have simply made the app worse. It is now clunky and slow, which makes it difficult to use. The UI at times is a mess and very cumbersome (try deleting things from your wishlist). 
From such a big company, this really should be slicker, smarter and easier to use. After all, you‚Äôre trying to us to buy stuff, right? So (for your own benefit) you should make it an easy and smooth process. But it isn‚Äôt. In fact, it is easier more enjoyable to use the website.

title: I hate this app
review:
It‚Äôs so hard to just do what I want. When I‚Äôm reality, it could all be so easy. Even wanting to just buy one thing from your basket requires me to remove everything else....WHY! In a shop I can fill a trolly and buy just one thing with real ease. Also products keep selling out in my basket but I get no warnings or notifications that it‚Äôs running low. And some of these product don‚Äôt come back. 

Will be happy when another company makes an app I appreciate more so I can never use this useless waist of time again.

title: Backward step with latest update
review: This is an app we use a lot. Unfortunately, the latest update may force a rethink as the new layout make scanning through the available items a real pain in the backside. The huge size of the product images combined with an inefficient operation of the filter options (having to reopen the filter options multiple times to make a full range of choices) has rendered the app virtually unusable. To me, this has the look of a smartphone app that‚Äôs been upscaled for use on an iPad rather than something that‚Äôs been designed for the purpose (as the previous version was).

title: It‚Äôs perfect
review: I have tried this app for years now and it has everything anything I search it will come up with many good options I love it so much I highly recommend this app for anyone who has little money or who needs high quality stuff there are some expensive stuff but there are also many cheap options it‚Äôs perfect download it now!

title: No filter options on Deals
review: Why make people‚Äôs shopping experience more difficult. I would regularly check the deals but use the filter to see things that I‚Äôm interested in. Unfortunately for me the filter options have been removed. This means you have to look through everything or nothing at all. I‚Äôve chosen nothing at all!

title: Disgusting
review: Took over ¬£80, when I tried to place the order it kept saying to update the payment method, I did and it took the money but still said the payment was invalid and that I needed to update it again, and therefore wouldn‚Äôt deliver any of the items I had bought. Really angry about this inconvenience as I don‚Äôt think I‚Äôll get it back. Won‚Äôt be using this app again and will find a more trustworthy online store. Doesn‚Äôt even deserve 1 star, I would give 0 but unfortunately you need a rating to post. It also suggest irrelevant things that have nothing to do with what‚Äôs on my wish list.

title: Very Slow
review: Found fine in the past, but when it changed in 2020 I now find it so slow logging in & should there be something in my basket it often comes up with a photo of a dog or cat as ‚Äòis an error on their side‚Äô. May be 3 or 4 times this happens. So frustrating since this started happening, I often give up & shop elsewhere. Never had this problem in 2019 so God only knows why they changed it.

title: Great but...
review: The app is amazing, it is very good to buy gifts for your family/friends. However, this does not stop me using the app, but it would make it much easier if you could put all the stuff in your wish list into folders, so it is easier to find what you are looking for. This app is amazing otherwise and an amazing app to look on for gifts for family friends

title: Brilliant ! But ....
review: Brilliant ! Whatever you order , you get .... the only pain is that even though the delivery can be put in the front porch which is open , some drivers either leave it on the doorstep , luckily a neighbour picked one up also one was blowing down the road ! Or they stuff them under the front of the car ..... mostly delivery is fine .

title: This new version is full of bugs and horrible. Please please fix this.
review:
The old app was great. You have turned it into an app full of frustrating bugs. It doesn‚Äôt work. It‚Äôs awful.
The price change notification in basket only stays up for a few seconds and then permanently disappears. The basket contents appears, goes blank, appears, goes blank. And other occasions it comes up and can‚Äôt close it or navigate away with forcing the app to close and start again.
You have not improved the app. You have downgraded it to rubbish that I can‚Äôt even use without losing my temper.

title: Terrible and less useful. Great for saving me money now!
review:
I understand app revamps and such but seems pointless and annoying when your just moving buttons. 

Ad features and not just move stuff.

The hamburger / 3 horizontal lines button, has moved from top left where the search bar was to bottoms right which has made changing categories and searching worse.

Now you can find yourself perpetually search pantry when when you want all things or Visa versa.

Also This new design is definitely going to save me money because there‚Äôs no section for my prime recommendations, books, pc parts, etc ridding me of impulse purchases.

I suppose thank you.

But I did enjoy seeing when some of these dropped in price so I‚Äôd prime it.

Floating bar at the bottom is not needed Tbf, could of just changed fonts, icons and color schemes and had same effect.

Il use the mobile web browser app in lieu of the phone app.

title: Baby list
review:
This used to be a good app but as always every update worsens the user experience. I am no longer able to access my created baby list using the app to view items i want to purchase ie if i go to the list menu all i can see is shopping and wish list. 

Also if i come across an item i would like to save to the baby list the option is no longer available. I instead can only save to my shopping and wishlist. 

It was a complete waste of time setting up the baby list as the functionality is poor.

title: Tracking of orders
review:
Today I ordered something that should be delivered tonight. It says handed to resident but nobody‚Äôs home and I couldn‚Äôt find it where courier normally leaves a package when nobody else is around. Normally a courier will leave a message where they left the parcel. 
If this certain parcel was left with a neighbor, please specify where you left the parcel to so it‚Äôs easier to know where and who received it? Because it will be very awkward to ask around neighbors if they have the parcel or not.
And please make it easier for customers to send messages or concerns in the app.

title: Fast, efficient, affordable
review: This app saves me a lot of time when searching for a certain product. If I just type in the product I want to see, it will have a 90% chance of showing. Usually, typing in the products into google usually give you the plug socket or accessory when accessing it through the ‚Äòshopping‚Äô tab/filter.

title: Tracker map not working properly since last iPhone update.
review: The tracker map isn‚Äôt working correctly since the last iPhone update I‚Äôve noticed - for instance, I have an order on its way tonight, and for the last 2 hours it has said it is 8 stops away...when it left the Croydon depot it was 8 stops away, and now it‚Äôs not too far from me, it‚Äôs STILL showing as 8 stops away! I believe this is a bug that the developer needs to fix, please look into this, thanks.

title: Changing address
review: All fine but sometimes can‚Äôt go back to previous item, and then on 3 occasions, always when I have tried to order something to a new address, the app has gone all the way through agreeing it will send the order to the new address, and then on the confirmation page shows the order with the default delivery address. I then have to cancel and re-order via computer. Very annoying.

title: Latest update
review:
What a disappointment. 
There is now this pale background and why oh why would you move the menu bar etc to the bottom where it gets in the way of the product description. It‚Äôs so awful I‚Äôve reverted to using the web page on my phone. 
I loved the app and it was functional everything at the top where you could see it not at the bottom where your hand covers it and it covers your item details. 
Ever heard the expression if it‚Äôs not broke. Don‚Äôt fix it!!! You broke it.

title: Used to be great
review: The app was what I expect. But lately things just don‚Äôt work properly and there is now easy feedback to sent to development to improve the issues. Layout keeps changing, wish list keeps reverting to any list it wants to show me not the last one I had selected, nor my default one.  Can‚Äôt see some details cos the item loads on the page then the zoom changes and all the words shrink and move around. Can‚Äôt read details and reviews. Very flakey.

title: Has been good but now if you view a product video you can‚Äôt go back
review: I‚Äôve used the app a lot and generally been really pleased with it but now if you view a product video you can‚Äôt go back.  The back tab has disappeared?  The only way to look at anything else is to close the app and start again from scratch!  Viewed on iPad Pro.

title: Has faults
review:
If you are looking at Daily Deals and scrolling down - if you click on an item to view, when you click back it refreshes the page and takes you right back to the top. Very frustrating. A few updates ago it only did it occasionally but now it‚Äôs every time. 
It has stopped me from looking at Daily Deals but is saving me from buying crap I don‚Äôt need. Maybe I should score it higher but no, it fails at the bit i use the most so 3/5.

title: Decent with minor annoyances
review:
Don‚Äôt like the new look for the app, but that‚Äôs just my opinion. 

One question-In the ‚Äòswitch account‚Äô section you could seamlessly transfer to another account(I use my partners) without inputting passwords etc. As of today (27/11)  the app has forgotten these other accounts and asks me to ‚Äòadd account‚Äô each time I try to swap. This, along with the region changing feature is extremely useful to me so why is the app not retaining the other account information?

title: Looks nothing like the screenshots
review: There seem to be different versions of the app appearance despite everyone being on the same version number. For ages mine remained dark whilst my OHs was light and with a more spaced out UI. Now I have the same version as he has. I used to feel left out but now I wish I had the previous version. There‚Äôs so much window chrome getting in the way. It‚Äôs annoying and would be better if it was fixed to the base of the screen.

title: New Home Page is Awful
review:
Updated the app on my iPad yesterday and hate the new home page.  The first thing you see is a photograph of the last thing you ordered which is really NOT helpful when you have ordered a birthday present for someone else in the household who uses the iPad!!

Also, where are the book recommendations tailored to you on the basis of what you have shown interest in previously?  One upside is that I will almost certainly spent a lot less as I won‚Äôt see a book I ‚Äúmust have‚Äù every time I access the site.

Please go back to the old Home Page.

title: Needs a print invoice button
review: Great app, easy to use but would be perfect if it had a feature where you can print out invoices of goods bought instead of having to go online and do it through the website, it would be easier and better to do it through the app as I‚Äôm always on it and never go online

title: Much less user friendly update
review: This new update is horrible. Why does the menu hover over everything instead of sitting nicely at the top like it used to? Why also does the hamburger menu button then display a list of options in a stupid sized font in unpredictable alignment with no visible separation between options. The old version was so much more intuitive. Please have a word with your developers who‚Äôve obviously just learnt a new skill and wanted to show it off to the detriment of the users.

title: Broken on older iPhone
review:
A recent update to this app has caused it to cut off the bottom of the display on my iPhone 7. It looks like it‚Äôs been optimised for newer (taller) screens. This is particularly noticeable when selecting sizes of products and you can‚Äôt see the price, or using the ‚ÄòBuy Now‚Äô button which then cuts off the ‚Äòswipe to buy‚Äô button. 

Unfortunately I couldn‚Äôt find how to give app feedback, hence leaving this review.

title: Good service
review: I can always find whatever I need on this website and delivery people are on time:hardworking, cheerful ‚Ä¶.. if there has ever been a problem over the years I have buying (hardly any to speak of )‚Ä¶ it has been dealt with immediately to my satisfaction ‚Ä¶ highly recommended their next day delivery on so many items is amazing ‚Ä¶.

title: Why can‚Äôt I delete some purchase items
review: Some items I would not like to be on my history and I should have the option to delete it but it seems impossible not every body would want the whole family know what is being bought by other members of the family it might be a surprise gift and that would help if I can delete the item off the history. Something needs to be done about that

title: Dislike!
review:
Firstly, you went away from intuitive positioning to a confusing one. Before, after you choose something at the top, you just scroll down and have a nice shopping experience. Now it feels that you want me never forget that I have a basket, buy buy buy buy. Not smooth and not pleasant. 

I don‚Äôt like the new colour scheme. Since colours are equally light (white light greenish light blueish) you need to concentrate. 

Finally. Don‚Äôt be so sneaky! This wasn‚Äôt simply ‚Äúfixing bugs‚Äù, you changed the design completely. State it up front. I wouldn‚Äôt update. To me previous version was just fine.

title: Fix the full screen auto launch video issue... if it is an issue
review: I have religiously used the app for years now and it has always been smooth. However after the latest update prime video ads are automatically launching in full screen after opening the app. This is highly annoying and invasive as many others have said. If this is a bug then it should be addressed soon and the app can be rated higher once again. If this is a marketing ploy and is going to stick around then I will be doing my shopping from the browser from now on.

title: GREAT APP
review: Have had no issues using this app. LOVE IT. The only thing I would change is when the item gets dispatched where is said, tell us where to leave it the only thing I would change is given us a option where it says Other, so we can Type it, As some of the options are not what I want to say or where to leave it so giving us an option so we can specify where to leave it.

title: A staple
review: Like many people, it‚Äôs one of those apps one uses often. Easy to use, search and see similar related items for for those you are looking to purchase or have purchased. Not a markdown but always thought it strange that the confirmation screen once an order has gone through looks very early 2000s!

title: Great, BUT I have a simple suggestion
review:
Night mode!

Please, for the love of god, implement a night mode feature. Even with my brightness down to the lowest possible setting, the white background pierced my eyes.

I, like a lot of others, like to browse in the evening when it‚Äôs time to wind down - I don‚Äôt really want to be blinded by the screen to the point that I have to close the app.....

title: Landscape mode back on track
review:
Re-reviewing due to bug fix 
So happy that Landscape mode is back on the app. Seems such a small thing but can really affect some people on their iPad Pro & keyboards. Many thanks for sorting this fast. I use the app so much & have never had any problems with it. Please keep Landscape viewing on the app from now on?

title: Terrible update
review: The colour scheme alone is enough to put me off, but the redesigned UI is confusing and less useful than the original. Why did it need changing? This app was actually one of my favourite to use, but now I‚Äôm inclined to go back to using the browser... perhaps allow users to switch to ‚Äúold‚Äù style? And to change the ghastly colour!

title: Wish list facility on iOS for iPad needs a fix
review: In the previous versions of the app, I was able to bring up my wish list, tap on an item on the drop-down column which would show the item in full screen behind it. Then you could tap the screen to move the drop-down column out of the way in order to read the products description and make a purchase if you so wish - now each time I tap an item in the drop down column, a copy of my wish list appears behind it...please fix!

title: Problems using Subscribe And Save & One Click
review: This app is ok for one click purchases and seeing my placed orders, but when it comes to using the Subscribe And Save option, it works for a short while and then it won‚Äôt show the Subscribe And Save option when I click on the item to subscribe to it. It‚Äôs very inconvenient. Plus, the one click option is now not showing at all despite being being selected in the settings.

title: Agree with other customers
review:
I still use this app BUT, since a recent update, there are so many bugs, especially not being able to see product options as they display 'off screen' at the bottom of my iPhone 7. 

The app has always been a bit glitchy in general. Areas that haven't had enough attention paid to them.

Please create a nicely refreshed app that works for your customers. You've got plenty of them!!!

title: Disappointing
review: Although having the app makes logging in quicker and easier, key features are missing. You can‚Äôt see where your deliveries are on a map without actually logging in on a laptop and the delivery times without the map are pretty useless. My delivery today just said ‚Äúbefore 9pm‚Äù, but it arrived just after 4pm, if I hadn‚Äôt logged in elsewhere to see the map, I would‚Äôve missed it. title: Almost 5 stars!
review:
I love how easy the app is in terms of searching and purchasing.

The only one thing the app lacking is the background function.

It would be nice if you could see the app with a black background just to make it easier on the eyes especially when browsing after hours. Even if it‚Äôs locked on black rather than white, it makes life a lot easier üëç

title: Not available for UK users?!?!?!?
review:
I have been using the app no problem in a last couple of years up to now! App on iPad ask for update but not available for UK users??? What a crap? 
Worst, without update I am unable to open the app. 
Seems i have to search and shop on eBay, as I never had similar or any other kind of problem using eBay app.

title: Not a seamless shopping experience
review:
Apparently not as described by most previous ‚Äòupdates‚Äô.

On the iPad it‚Äôs what I‚Äôm used to (and I don‚Äôt mind change...) but for some reason the iPhone version has gone all turquoise-ish and has a random floating bar to the base of the screen.

I deleted it, assuming it had a fault and it downloaded again, where it seemed apparently back to normal, but when I closed the app and tried it again later, it transformed with the annoying random colour and floating bar design returned. 

Seems an odd thing to do, showing differing designs and operating procedures, dependant on the device used. 

I‚Äôve now stopped using it on the phone cos it irritated so much that I deleted it and now just use it on the iPad. I‚Äôll re-check in the future perhaps but I‚Äôm in no rush to have it on the phone again. 
Odd marketing by the developers - it results in less chance of selling me stuff!

title: Can‚Äôt sort by price anymore
review:
The most recent update has annihilated the app. When searching for a product you might see a load of results and think, ‚Äòah, I‚Äôd prefer to see these in ascending price order‚Äô. Used to work fine - now it actually gets rid of all the useful results.

I don‚Äôt say that to exaggerate... Search for ‚Äòpc monitor‚Äô, tap ‚Äòprime‚Äô, then do some searching. Some fab results, right? Now press ‚Äòlow to high‚Äô. Just try to find a single pc monitor. Genuinely... How has it managed to filter out all of the pc monitors and left you with only RPi monitors and OLED dev kits?! 

Somehow the algorithm is doing something genuinely incredible, but that thing is not what I‚Äôve asked for. 10/10 for innovation. 0/10 for execution. 

Also, please bring back the old filter options?! Or at least a way to filter more thoroughly on mobile? It‚Äôs not hard... just port it from the web version.

title: Nice looking but unecessary update
review:
It was a great app but each new version has been a step backward in functionality. Why can't I buy e-books through the app anymore? It was one feature I used the most!
Why must people always try to fix what isn't broken?

Still can‚Äôt buy e books, get a grip app creator. Listen to your users!

title: Not intuitive and clunky
review:
The new filter options along the top have added nothing to the app and the ‚Äúsort by‚Äù option is buried away in these filters. Maybe personal preference but I prefer the ‚Äúsort by‚Äù option to appear separately. I don‚Äôt actually see how sorting is construed as a filter (I‚Äôm not removing certain results) 

Also, as someone a few people have mentioned - too many sponsored ads in the listings. Maybe as a Prime member we should have the ability to suppress these?

title: Really poor design
review: The app works, but man is it a pain in the backside to use. You can‚Äôt just click the reviews number next to the star rating, you have to scroll all the way to the bottom of the item page to read them. And if you click to expand a photo, you can‚Äôt scroll to see other photos - your only option is to go back and refresh the whole item page again. Just really stupid design flaws ruining what is otherwise a half decent experience.

title: Formatting messed up
review:
In the last update you managed to screw something up now every item page‚Äôs formatting is messed up all scrunched together on the right hand side, hope a fix is coming soon.

Also if a item has multiple versions to choose from if you pick another then all the information about the product and anything else below that box and the pictures of the item vanishes and you can‚Äôt even purchase the item the. As that includes the Buy button.

Please fix quickly, can‚Äôt really use the app like this.

title: A waste of space and time!!
review:
This app is annoying beyond belief. Firstly, when you sign in it takes so long to bring up a(any) screen page, you may as well go away on holiday for a week.

Secondly, it only PARTLY syncs with the browser version. As an example, in the app, I've just clicked on recently viewed items and it brings up only the items I've viewed via the app, not the items I've viewed via browser, and yet it updates my shopping basket. This means I have to go back to the browser version just to see what I've been looking at.

Time wasting beyond belief.

title: No sharing items button with new update
review: Tried to share a specific item from the app but I cannot not find the share button, after speaking to support they could find the share button them selves but they suggested to make a list and place the item in a list then share the list with someone, just to share one item which I find silly because it makes it 3-4 steps longer than it should be just to share one item, please revert back or re add the SHARE BUTTON PLEASE!!!!!

title: Good app that lets itself down
review: This app has a lot of good qualities - it‚Äôs intuitive and easy to use etc, but it‚Äôs a bit frustrating how limited the suggestions on the home page are and how they are oriented more towards gender than past purchases or preferences. This often leads to me choosing to use the website to shop instead though it is sometimes easier to pay through the app once the items are in my basket.

title: It‚Äôs really good app
review: It‚Äôs really good app, but can I suggest something? On the order history could show the price we bought something and when you press ‚Äúbuy again‚Äù to show the price at the moment. This way the customer can decide if will buy it again, or tell a friend how much they bought the item....

title: What went wrong!!
review: App worked ok at first. A bit slow at times and I got fed up with the same message saying it‚Äôs still loading. But now, it is useless. So slow and it will not allow me to put items in my wish list. You can‚Äôt do it by tapping and dragging. So basically pointless. There is no way of saving items you are interested in or want to compare. All I can do is search for items. Well I can do that and save to my wish list on the website so what is the point of the app? Lots of things don‚Äôt work now and It is useless since the last update.

title: App doesn‚Äôt work properly after new update
review:
I find the new update a bit buggy. Most of the time, the app automatically changes my chosen delivery date without me even touching the screen and I have to change it back myself. 

One more thing, once you have placed the order, there is no button to quickly navigate to the Homepage or Orders page. The only button there is the Back button, when you press it, it takes you back to payment processing page which makes you think you would be charged again if you don‚Äôt quit now. So I would quit the app, kill it and open again.

I never had any issues with the app before this update. So hopefully the app developers will see this and have it fixed. 

Many thanks

title: Easy to shop
review:
Great stock. Easy to find what you need.
What is missing is a link where you could say you received your order as if you go to your orders you could see a message saying your order is coming later as you expected.
Just a button where you could say I received my item.

title: Great app but please bring back widget

Up until a few months ago the app came with a widget which made it easier to check on orders at a glance and was a fast link to track orders and see how many stops away the courier was on the map etc rather than going into the app and finding the order to see.

title: Still broken
review: The last update (or maybe the one before) broke the formatting of item descriptions - a narrow column of text down the right of the screen, and acres of white space to the left, overlapping text in that column, etc, etc.  This latest update hasn‚Äôt done anything about that.  Can we please go back a few versions to the app that worked properly?  And could you please institute a policy of testing updates before release?

title: New update lots of problems
review:
- app errors out for looking at your own wedding registry (past event)
- moving the wish list 'see other list' to the top right hand side which isn't convenient when you quick want to select between lists
- in your wish list when an item is no longer available your clueless as to what it was so you can order an alternative
- surely there should be a review tab where it gives you a list of recent products you've brought and allow you easily write quick reviews and upload photos

review:

Functionality is still great but please, stop messing about with UI for the sake of it. Go back to a single menu bar at the top and be done with it. Or if you really want to get creative, give users the choice of UI - as long as you include a simple top bar option.

title: I like the app, but
review:
I like the app, but I find that I cannot load the app without being forced to see prime video adverts, they pop up when I‚Äôm about to do a search and it makes me lose what I was about to look for.

Oh then it refreshes when I switch between apps to message someone so of course i get forced to see the adverts yet again.

This is intrusive and just disgusting. We‚Äôre spending money in this and prime and yet you still spam us! Even Netflix doesn‚Äôt do that!

title: The search only gives a few results
review:
Since the last update if you search for something.. say ‚ÄúPokemon‚Äù it only gives you a handful of results. 
When you search the exact same thing on the pc on the official website.. it gives you 1000+ results. I think the last update broke something. But I have no idea how to repost this. Reading reviews it looks like I‚Äôm not the only one. I‚Äôll reverse this feedback once this issue is solved. As this was my main go too shopping app at one point. Now it‚Äôs unusable to search and buy anything.

title: Filter facilities abysmal
review: If you‚Äôre happy to but the first product you see you might rate this app as 5 stars.  I can‚Äôt rate it as any more than 1.  As a consumer I want to be able to have greater control over my search.  An example.  I search for an alarm clock, I want to be able to filter for specific features as well... I may want just DAB radio alarm clocks or just Smart clocks but alas the app doesn‚Äôt allow this.    It‚Äôs also full of unknown brands!  You should be able to filter this so you can easily see brands you know and love.  Definitely works work!

title: Customer service
review: Bought a laptop, touchpad didn‚Äôt work, falsely advertised for Microsoft subscription. Contacted customer service less than an hour after delivery. Unhelpful and passed onto 8!!! Different people. Asked to be called back instead of chat. Asked could I use a different number rather than the UK üòÇ when I explained that‚Äôs where I lived. Kept getting fobbed off with someone will call within 5 mins..... that never happened and I had to find the number to call them. Horrendous customer service and attitude. I‚Äôve now cancelled my Prime due to this.

title: Wish List on iPad
review:
The Wish List feature is great, especially for adding Kindle books to in order to download later on the Kindle.

However they don‚Äôt seem to work properly on the iPad (but they do on the iPhone).

I have a Reading List set as default, however when I add a new Kindle book via Add to List it automatically creates a new list and adds it that. I the have to go to Wish List, select the newly created list, move the book to my Reading List and delete the newly created list, very annoying.

title: App is fine but!!!
review:
Appp is fine but there are couple of improvements I would like to suggest. 
Some sellers particularly from China have extended delivery date. It would be useful to see a list of outstanding deliveries rather than searching thro‚Äô my all my orders.

title: Can you stop the auto play adverts please?
review: Normally a great app but last update seems to have introduced automatic playing of prime video ads when the app is opened. Please stop. When I want to buy something I open the app and then waiting for a video to end just gets in the way of me spending money !  I‚Äôm a prime subscriber, and on any other app I‚Äôd expect that to turn off adverts. Please stop the auto plays and it will be back to. 5 stars from me.

title: No landscape mode on iPad
review:
Like many others, on my iPad the app no longer works in landscape mode. Adding this review as a protest, because I can't believe amazons software testing department didn't know this would happen. title: Confusing

If your not sure what to do you must allow future customers more time to set up account.  After all we are not all aged 19 and super smart!

title: Site is good but....

title: Don‚Äôt change what is not broken

Don‚Äôt know where the obsession with changing things just because comes from, it it ain‚Äôt broke don‚Äôt fix it.

title: Love it all üëç

Love Prime video. It has great films, series and other good book to. Hope they don‚Äôt put the price up and put everyone off üòè

title: Organisational discrimination

It won‚Äôt highlight what‚Äôs wrong with the payment details and eBay doesn‚Äôt seem to have any problems with my payment details so I‚Äôm not sure what amazon‚Äôs problem is but if you won‚Äôt let me buy something, that‚Äôs fine by me. title: Options great
review: Problem is with some of the deliveries, anyone seems to be able to become a delivery contractor and some of them are in that much of a hurry they don‚Äôt wait for you to get to the door and on some occasions if we didn‚Äôt have cameras we wouldn‚Äôt know they had been

title: New Update

I search for a specific product, using the model or actual part number and it returns thousands of unrelated garbage items. Use eBay. title: Awful Delivery
review: Twice I have bought a product from this place and twice it failed to arrive on time. I mean COME ON. Realistically delivery should only take around a week because of the logistics of packaging it, flying it out and having it go through some form of customs before reaching you. But a whole month? Over a month just for a package is really ridiculous.

title: as much use as a chocolate ashtray on the back of a motorbike

title: Substandard customer service help desk

title: Why so much hate???

title: Just love

title: Appalling

title: Unexpected premium charge

title: Update is awful
